name: Easy Chicken Karahi Recipe | Shireen Anwar | Masala TV
ingredients: Ingredients for Easy Chicken Karahi Recipe: Chicken 1kg 16 pieces Black pepper coarsely crushed 1 ½ tsp Ginger garlic 1 tbsp Lemon juice 1 tbsp Salt 1 ½ tsp Yoghurt ½ cups Oil quarter cup Brown onion grinded 2 â 3tbsp Tomatoes blended 3 Salt quarter tsp Crushed red pepper 1 ½ tsp Allspice ½ tsp Ginger garlic 1tsp Coriander leaf 2 tbsp Green chilies 2 chopped
instructions: Marinate chicken with yoghurt, salt and black pepper, lemon juice, ginger garlic. Leave it for 3o min. Heat oil, add ginger garlic paste with blended tomatoes, salt, crushed red pepper, brown onion, and marinated chicken, cover and cook till chicken tender. Lastly add allspice, coriander leaf and green chilies.
